---
category: news
title: "Self-driving commercial vehicles to hit western Seoul in October"
excerpt: "Self-driving commercial vehicles will hit the roads in Seoul's western district of Sangam as early as October, the city government said Tuesday. A new ordinance by the city government of Seoul on the operation of a special zone to host a pilot self-driving commercial vehicle project went into effect Tuesday in a bid to help expedite the commercialization of driverless cars in the city."
